name.description: Give a name to this configuration so it can be later referenced by config-ref.

name.name: name

enum.description: Action to take when no token is found.
enum.caption: On No Token
enum.name: onNoToken

string.description: The application identifier as registered with Facebook.

string.name: consumerKey

string.description: The application secret.
string.caption: Consumer Secret

string.description: Facebook permissions.
string.caption: Scope
string.name: scope

cloud-connector.caption: Facebook
